mapper.select: WITH total_sales AS( SELECT pname,SUM(pcount) as pcount ,pno, FORMAT(sum(dprice), 0) as price FROM orderherb where odate like '%2022%' group by pname ) SELECT pname, pcount,price,pno, concat(ROUND(100.0*pcount / SUM(pcount) OVER(), 2),'%') as sum FROM total_sales group by pname order by pno desc, sum desc LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset} ;
